author: CBC News
title: Get informed on the top stories of the day in one quick scan
description: In today's Morning Brief, we look at the state of the Canadian real estate market amid the coronavirus pandemic. We also look ahead to the release of the federal government's COVID-19 forecasts, and why we're not testing everybody for the coronavirus.
content:
Good morning! This is our daily news roundup with everything you need to know in one concise read. Sign up here to get this delivered to your inbox every morning.
